verbs.description: [ARG0: iraq] [V: deploys] [ARG1: up to 30 000 fighters] [ARG2: to secure border] [ARGM-PRD: from isis iraq] has deployed 20 000 shiite paramilitaries and up to 10 000 army troops to its border amid fears isis could be poised to cross over from syria sunni muslim jim mattis sdf syrian democratic forces iraq isis band iraqi army brigades united nations isis popular mobilization forces nineveh pmf iraqi government hisham al - hashimi syria anbar
